TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AccessibilityManager extends Java.Lang.Object
Public NotInheritable Class AccessibilityManager Inherits Object
public ref class AccessibilityManager sealed : Java::Lang::Object

Docs.summary: System level service that serves as an event dispatch for AccessibilityEvents, and provides facilities for querying the accessibility state of the system.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public int GetRecommendedTimeoutMillis (int originalTimeout, Android.Views.Accessibility.ContentMode uiContentFlags);
.method public hidebysig instance int32 GetRecommendedTimeoutMillis(int32 originalTimeout, valuetype Android.Views.Accessibility.ContentMode uiContentFlags) cil managed
Public Function GetRecommendedTimeoutMillis (originalTimeout As Integer, uiContentFlags As ContentMode) As Integer

Docs.param: The timeout appropriate for users with no accessibility needs.
The combination of flags #FLAG_CONTENT_ICONS, #FLAG_CONTENT_TEXT or #FLAG_CONTENT_CONTROLS to indicate the contents of UI.
Docs.summary: Get the recommended timeout for changes to the UI needed by this user.
Docs.returns: The recommended UI timeout for the current user in milliseconds.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SendAccessibilityEvent(class Android.Views.Accessibility.AccessibilityEvent e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Sends an AccessibilityEvent.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception:
if accessibility is not enabled.
Note: The preferred mechanism for sending custom accessibility events is through calling
instead of this method to allow predecessors to augment/filter events sent by their descendants.
